summary:
Skyrim Facelifts: Followers SVEN Edition
A facelift for follower Sven, with two version available.
descriptionHtml:
[i][center][img]http://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/33659-4-1363858079.png[/img]
[heading]"With you as my muse, how could I not?"[/center][/i][/heading]
One third of everyone's favorite Riverwood love triangle. Sven, the Nord Bard.
This is a very simple facelift; did very little editing to the facial structure, though I changed his eyebrows, eye shape, and lips. Also added a scar, freckles, and facial hair.
This comes in two version, both using vanilla hairstyles since I am unable to find custom hairs that I like or thought would fit. There are also two sub versions that give him a simple warpaint.

[b][size=3]REQUIREMENTS:[/size][/b]
No files required

[b][size=3]MODS USED:[/size][/b]
[list]
[*][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2488]Better Males by Chris57 [/url]
[*][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4869]Covereyes [/url]
[*][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/3574]Gizmodian Scars [/url]
[*][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/33213]Luddemanns Armory | Bard Set [/url] Armor used in screenshots.
[*][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/31680]Become a Bard [/url] (for the lute seen in the screenshots)
[/list]
[size=3][b]INSTALL:[/b][/size]
[list]
[*]Install : Use NMM or extract the files into the skyrim root folder manually. Make sure that the .esp is below mods that affect followers such as UFO
[*]Uninstall : Use NMM or delete all of the files manually.
[/list]
[b][size=3]COMPATIBILITY:[/size][/b]
My facelifts should be compatible with all mods, including follower overhauls, face/skin textures, etc, etc. Just be sure to place the .esp at the end of the load order after all other companion mods.
author: RavenSylphe
